text.en: From this moment on, throughout all my future lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni di né tsé rab tamché du

text.en: May I be cared for by the guru and supreme deity,
text.en-trans: lama lhakpé lha yi jé su zung

text.en: Master the treasury of oceanic qualities that come from the threefold training,
text.en-trans: lab sum yönten gyatsö ter la wang

text.en: And effortlessly bring vast benefit to the teachings and beings!
text.en-trans: ten drö dön chen bé mé drubpar shok
